Package org.goplanit.utils.network.virtual

Interface ConnectoidEdge

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IdAble>, DirectedEdge, Edge, ExternalIdAble, GraphEntity, IdAble, ManagedId, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectoidEdgeImpl
    public interface ConnectoidEdge
extends DirectedEdge
    the connecting component between centroid and a first physical node in the network. Note that all connectoids are directed edges but not all edges are connectoids
    Author:
    markr

      • registerConnectoidSegment

        ConnectoidSegment registerConnectoidSegment​(ConnectoidSegment connectoidSegment,
                                            boolean directionAB)
        Register connectoidSegment. If there already exists a connectoidSegment for that direction it is replaced and returned
        Parameters:
        connectoidSegment - connectoid segment to be registered
        directionAB - direction of travel
        Returns:
